1.0.name: wordpress/password-strength-indicator-using-jquery-and-xml
1.0.description: This WP plugin use Password Strength Indicator using jQuery and XML plugin to display the password strength meter to help users create strong password. The password indicator will be displayed in the format "11 more characters, At least 2 more numbers, 1 more symbol, 1 Upper case characters". The password policy information is stored in an XML file and the client-side script and code behind are using the information in the XML file to perform the password strength validation.
